Package com.seailz.discordjv.events

Class EventDispatcher

java.lang.Object
com.seailz.discordjv.events.EventDispatcher
public class EventDispatcher extends Object
This class is used to dispatch events to the correct listeners. This class is an internal class and should not be used by the end user.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Seailz

  • Constructor Details

    • EventDispatcher

      public EventDispatcher(DiscordJv bot)

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener(DiscordListener... listeners)
      Registers a listener to the dispatcher. When an event is fired, the dispatcher will call the listener method that is marked with the EventMethod annotation.
      Parameters:
      listeners - The listeners to register
      Since:
      1.0

    • dispatchEvent

      public void dispatchEvent(Event event, Class<? extends Event> type, DiscordJv djv)
      Dispatches an event to all registered listeners. This method is called by the DiscordJv class & other internal classes and should not be called by the end user.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to dispatch
      Since:
      1.0
